entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -1.2°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -2.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain and a few flurries changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening then to light snow after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
